title: Assassins & Mob Wives: Couples Retreat
description: Driving down pleasure road straight to mayhem...We need a girls trip.Time for these assassins and mob wives to let down our hair and have fun.Danger seems to rear its ugly head whenever it comes to any of the ladies in our circle. One week on the road before we meet our husbands on a romantic retreat.Our husbands have one request...don't kill anyone.Hmm, can we obey and accept our sweet reward in Punta Cana?
author: Shantee' A. Parks (Posey Parks)
